title: Chao Shen Xueyuan Zhi Hei Jia
description: The gods and demons came to the earth at the same time. They drove a huge spaceship and launched a fierce attack on the earth. Since then, the world has been changed in the flames of war. A male company wearing black armor will shoulder the responsibility of resisting invasion. They inherited the super genes of higher civilizations and grew up on the earth, protecting mankind and guarding world peace.
